column4: Hi there.  I have an ATI/Intel muxless hybrid graphics system.  radeon/vgaswitcheroo can't handle it (muxless).  Can fglrx?  Do I need to downgrade xorg-server (from 1.13) for fglrx to work?
if no one knows... you may want to check the forums and askubuntu.com and ask again in about 10 min...
